articles.description: The clock is ticking for Arsenal and manager Mikel Arteta to show they can be winners after Champions League exit to PSG, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Arsenal still a nearly team after PSG end Champions league dream

articles.description: Paris St-Germain are in a "special moment" after their Champions League semi-final victory over Arsenal - with boss Luis Enrique striking a balance between star quality, togetherness and hard work.
articles.title: PSG 2-1 Arsenal (3-1 agg): Paris St-Germain are in 'special moment' after reaching Champions League final

articles.description: Maro Itoje is set to be confirmed on Thursday as the British and Irish Lions captain for the tour of Australia.
articles.title: Maro Itoje set to be named British and Irish Lions captain

articles.description: India captain Rohit Sharma has announces his retirement from Test cricket at the age of 38.
articles.title: Rohit Sharma: India's Test captain retires from longest format

articles.description: Mikel Arteta believes Arsenal were the best team in the Champions League this season despite losing their semi-final tie to Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Mikel Arteta: Arsenal '100%' the best team in Champions League

articles.description: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou claims "Spurs does crazy things to people" in response to Arsene Wenger's suggestion the winners of the Europa League should not qualify for the Champions League.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur: Ange Postecoglou questions Arsene Wenger over Champions League qualification

articles.description: Arsene Wenger proposes a change to the offside rule that would mean attackers are onside if any part of their body is in line with the last outfield defender.
articles.title: Arsene Wenger: Former Arsenal boss proposes change to offside rule after VAR effect

articles.description: No matches between India and Pakistan should take place amid the ongoing tensions after the Kashmir militant attack, says India men's coach Gautam Gambhir.
articles.title: India-Pakistan: No cricket matches until Kashmir attack conflict resolved - Gautam Gambhir

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says winning the Masters will help him feel "more comfortable and a lot less pressure" at next week's US PGA Championship.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Masters champion has 'nothing but positive vibes' before major return

articles.description: Emma Raducanu and Cameron Norrie win their first-round matches at the Italian Open in Rome but Katie Boulter suffers defeat in Rome.
articles.title: Italian Open: Emma Raducanu and Cameron Norrie secure first-round wins but Katie Boulter is beaten
